Name: Alcobra Ltd
Description: Alcobra Ltd., a biopharmaceutical company, focuses on the development and commercialization of proprietary pharmaceutical products. The company? s product candidates include Abuse-Deterrent Amphetamine Immediate-Release (ADAIR), a proprietary, abuse-deterrent oral formulation of immediate-release (short-acting) dextroamphetamine for the treatment of attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and narcolepsy; and Metadoxine Extended Release (MDX), a proprietary oral drug for the treatment of ADHD and other cognitive disorders, including Fragile X syndrome. Alcobra Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.
